channel.title: Ananas Analytics Desktop Blog
channel.description: The best place to stay up-to-date with the latest Ananas Analytics Desktop news and events.

item.title: Release Version 0.8.2
item.description:
Version 0.8.2 is a bug fix release.

After publishing Ananas Desktop on Hacker News, we received a lots of constructive feedbacks, and valuable issue reports. Thanks a lot Hacker News for organizing such a great community.

In version 0.8.2, we mainly ...

item.title: Release Version 0.8.1
item.description:
Version 0.8.1 is a bug fix release.

  • Support concat (union) up-to 5 inputs on one single concat step
  • fix Flink concat input types not match issue
  • change default gcs source and destination download sample size to 0 (no limit)
  • improve error message whe...

item.title: Release Version 0.8.0
item.description:
We are proud to announce the first release of Ananas Desktop - a hackable data integration/analysis tool to enable non technical users to edit data processing jobs and visualise data on demand.

In the very first version, we support following features:
